title: S7E24 – "Horrific Hollows" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark – the closing chapter to another amazing season of shiver-inducing stories – we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Michael "ShadowSwimmer77" Landry, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about paranormal pursuit, deadly detours, vicious vengeance, and not-so-mirthful myths.  

                         
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
